welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zonnebeke, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lesquin Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ostend/Bruges International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
